feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing multiple gameplay/UI features with affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose in the game.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and theme variable definitions including light/dark mode color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps GameScreen in OrientationGuard inside a full-screen container.
frontend/src/game/effects/Explosion.tsx: Explosion component rendering hit, player, and bomb effects with deterministic ember patterns.
frontend/src/game/entities/Bullet.tsx: Bullet visual component positioned by percent coordinates and rotated to match firing angle.
frontend/src/game/entities/Obstacle.tsx: Renders a hexagon obstacle with size scaling, boss visuals, and animated SVG effects.
frontend/src/game/entities/PlayerJet.tsx: Displays the player jet with rotation, animated thruster effects, and detailed SVG body.
frontend/src/game/GameScreen.tsx: Main game logic controlling player movement, obstacles, bullets, collisions, scoring, and level flow.
frontend/src/game/physics/bounds.ts: Provides clamping, boundary reflection, and out‑of‑bounds checks for entity positions.
frontend/src/game/physics/obstacleCollis: Resolves elastic collisions between circular obstacles with separation and damped impulse.
frontend/src/game/physics/playerObstacle: Determines whether a player–obstacle collision is a full hit based on overlap depth.
frontend/src/game/physics/vectors.ts: Contains vector helpers for angles, pixel‑to‑percent velocity conversion, and offset positioning.
frontend/src/game/Playfield.tsx: Renders the bordered playfield container with decorative corners and grid overlay.
frontend/src/game/ui/GameOverlay.tsx: Implements the HUD and controls overlay including score, timer, progress bars, and joystick input.
frontend/src/game/ui/OrientationGuard.ts: Shows a rotate-device overlay when in portrait mode and attempts to lock orientation to landscape.
frontend/src/game/ui/ShootButton.tsx: A press-and-hold shoot button managing pointer events to trigger fire start and end callbacks.
frontend/src/game/ui/VirtualJoystick.tsx: Implements a touch joystick that tracks pointer movement, outputs normalized vectors, and resets on release.
frontend/src/game/utils/levelTimer.ts: Provides functions to compute level durations and format seconds into display strings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, providing login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module exporting nothing for game-side query handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom theme variables and utilities for the game's color and visual style.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query and identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, plugin use, and extensive custom colors, radii, shadows, and keyframes for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project state describing mobile UI scaling and gameplay fix requirements, including visual bugs, collision issues, and landscape enforcement.
